<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Warding Light](/Feats.aspx?ID=2173) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Legends](/Sources.aspx?ID=40) pg. 101</row>

**Archetype** [Bright Lion](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=129)

**Prerequisites**
[Bright Lion Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2172)

</column>

---

You gain a tattoo that serves as a special ward to defend you against [Walkena's](/Deities.aspx?ID=159) forces. The tattoo allows you to cast the [_light_](/Spells.aspx?ID=171) cantrip as a divine innate spell at will. The cantrip is heightened to a spell level equal to half your level rounded up. If you die, the tattoo immediately casts [_gentle repose_](/Spells.aspx?ID=131) on your corpse, heightened to the same spell level.
name: Warding Light
